titleInfo.title: VEN YOU KUME TO EDMONTON SHUST DON'T KICK MY DOG AROUND.

mods:mods.note: "Orange felt flag with word ""Edmonton"" is affixed to the left side of the card; right side features an illustration of a sad child wearing clogs walking with her dog"

Dear Flo; If you did not send Mrs. G. the mirrors of Jan 17 & 24 please send them to us as we did not get those numbers yet. Read the [magazines] today. Just arrived home from a basket ball game between Varsity 2nd team & VNS. the score being 23 to 8 in favor of VNS. Eve

"This card may be mailed for 1c if address and greeting such as ""Yours Truly"" with signature of sender is written . If message is written also, 2c postage is required. ; Written in m.s.: Dont you think this is a good one on the card"
